revised_title: Discovery and Description of Ceratodus, a New Genus of Ganoid Fishes
tldr: The author, Albert Günther, describes the discovery of a new genus of ganoid fish, Ceratodus, found in rivers of Queensland, Australia. He provides a detailed analysis of its external and internal anatomy, comparing it to other fish species and discussing its evolutionary relationships. Günther also proposes a new classification for this suborder of fish, based on their unique characteristics.
